00068 @interface DDXMLNode : NSObject <NSCopying>
00069 {
00070  // Every DDXML object is simply a wrapper around an underlying libxml node
00071  xmlKindPtr genericPtr;
00072  
00073  // The xmlNsPtr type doesn't store a reference to it's parent
00074  // This is here to fix that problem, and make this class more compatible with the NSXML classes
00075  xmlNodePtr nsParentPtr;
00076 }
